english.segment1: I am high above the timberline. Where the sky and mountains meet. Up where the air is very thin. Somehow it's easier to breathe
english.segment2: Like the wind in the canyon echoing. The spirit is calling me, whispering
english.segment3: Out here, in the wild and the wonder. Where the lightning and the thunder. Serve a great awakening
english.segment4: Out here, where the one who did the making. Is still in me creating, a place where I am free. I can hear, I can breathe, I believe, out here
english.segment5: I am knee deep in the chaos. Of another crazy day. It's me and all the other rats. Just trying to stay in the race
english.segment6: I close my eyes and I try listening. And I find the spirit is still calling me
english.segment7: Out here, in the wild and the wonder. Where the lightning and the thunder. Serve a great awakening
english.segment8: Out here, where the one who did the making. Is still in me creating, a place where I am free. I can hear, I can breathe, I believe, out here
english.segment9: Out here, in the wild and the wonder. Where the lightning and the thunder. Bring a great awakening
english.segment10: Out here, where the one who did the making. Is still in me creating, a place where I am free. I can hear, I can breathe, I believe
english.segment11: Out here, here, here, here, here
